name: typedoc-gitlab-wiki-theme
description: A typedoc-plugin-markdown theme that publishes Markdown pages compatible with Gitlab Wiki.

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.docs: rm -rf ./demo && npm run build && typedoc --options ../../stubs/typedoc.1.js --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --plugin ./dist/index --out ./out

author: Thomas Grey
